0.name: [Pippi]
0.text: I'm glad we were able to find that canary's mother.

1.name: [Pippi]
1.text: There's something about seeing a mother reunite with her child that just warms my heart.

2.name: [Pippi]
2.text: Anyway, my mom asked us to go see the mayor.

3.name: [Pippi]
3.text: I wonder what he has to say.
